additionalDescription: A high-powered sniper rifle with piercing capabilities. Deals massive damage per shot but has a slow fire rate and requires precision. The piercing damage allows bullets to pass through multiple enemies. Perfect for long-range elimination of high-priority targets.
tips: Piercing shots can hit multiple enemies in a line
Slow fire rate requires careful aim
Best used for eliminating high-value targets
High recoil means you need to re-aim between shots
